parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The accelerated domain name. You can specify only one domain name in each request.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description:
The end of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC.

> The end time must be later than the start time.

parameters.name: ObjectPath
parameters.description: The path of the object. The path is used as a condition for exact matching.

parameters.name: ObjectType
parameters.description:
The type of the task.

*   **file**: URL-based refresh
*   **directory**: directory-based refresh
*   **preload**: URL-based prefetch

If you set **DomainName** or **Status**, you must also set this parameter.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Valid values: **1** to **100000**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Default value: **20**. Maximum value: **50**. Valid values: **1** to **50**.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of the task.

*   **Complete**: The task is complete.
*   **Refreshing**: The task is in progress.
*   **Failed**: The task failed.

parameters.name: TaskId
parameters.description: The ID of the task. A task ID is assigned when you create a refresh or prefetch task.
